original_text: I dispersed them among the nations, and they were scattered through the countries; I judged them according to their conduct and their actions.
korean_text: 그들을 그 행위대로 심판하여 각국에 흩으며 여러 나라에 헤쳤더니

sentences.original_text: I dispersed them among the nations
and they were scattered through the countries
I judged them according to their conduct
